game.name: DCS: A-10A Flaming Cliffs
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Captions available, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: The A-10A Thunderbolt II, also known as the Warthog, is a 'flying gun'. The aircraft was used extensively during Operation Desert Storm, in support of NATO operations in response to the Kosovo crisis, in Operation Enduring Freedom in Afghanistan and in Operation Iraqi Freedom.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The A-10A Thunderbolt II, also known as the Warthog, is a 'flying gun'.
